forum.content:
Currently taking my degree in Taiwan and I'm fluent in both Mandarin and English. Hoping to meet more new friends, be it a foreigner or a Taiwanese. Making use of the chance to speak more English before I get rusty at it ≧ω≦

If anyone's interested in finding a Mandarin or English tutor, feel free to ask me too. ＾ω＾
forum.title: I'm a native English speaker
